p: The quality and shelf‐life of meat and meat products could be significantly affected by microbial growth and lipid oxidation. The edible coating based on Plantago major seed mucilage and Citrus limon essential oil effectively decreased the lipid oxidation, hardness loss, and microbial growth in the buffalo meat during cold storage. The coated meat had also a higher consumer acceptance compared to the control sample. Therefore, Citrus limon essential oil‐rich Plantago major seed mucilage based edible coatings have the potential to maintain/improve the characteristics of meat products during the shelf‐life.
